casebody.data:
Robert J. BROUSSARD, et al.
v.
MULTI-CHEM GROUP, LLC NO. 2018-C-1347 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 14, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF IBERIA Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons. I would grant and docket this application to examine the standard for awarding damages for fear of developing cancer in toxic tort cases.
